name: Factory Escape (Piepsii, Sabbe99, CarmAngler, Thraez, Marpal)
name_original: Factory Escape (Piepsii, Sabbe99, CarmAngler, Thraez, Marpal)
description:
The Factory is collapsing! Quick! make your escape, pay attention to the lasers, make sure to be of the correct color.

Controls:

UP/ DOWN: move up and down between the lanes

1 | 2 | 3: change colours

ESC: quit to main menu
